subject: [Mhln] Dreamweaver download
body:
A man can believe a considerable deal of rubbish, and yet go about his daily work in a rational and cheerful manner.

Efficiency is doing better what is already being done.

Any change, even for the better, is always accompanied by drawbacks and discomforts.

The Goddess Fortune is the devil's servant, ready to kiss any one's ass.

It is a good rule to face difficulties at the time they arise and not allow them to increase unacknowledged.

The attainment of an ideal is often the beginning of a disillusion.

A great leader never sets himself above his followers except in carrying responsibilities.

This is the punishment of a liar: he is not believed, even when he speaks the truth.

Friends come and go but enemies accumulate.

These two imparadised in one another's arms, the happier Eden, shall enjoy their fill of bliss on bliss.

The 1980s are to debt what the 1960s were to sex.  The 1960s left a hangover. So will the 1980s.

In my room as a kid... I'd play a fighter and get knocked to the floor and come back to win.

Let your friends be the friends of your deliberate choice.''
